channel.title: Stock Surge on FinanClub

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:21 Chances: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) has soared 52% in 2024, attracting Big Money activity. The CEO mentioned that the company will improve due to AI. Palantir may see upside from its push into ‘generative’ artificial intelligence. Risks: The data mining and analytics company faces near-term challenges.
